Posts.EditableText:
I want to add a dice roll to my story.

I have the code example but do not know where it goes.

Does it go in the body of the story or is it added into the page link?
Posts.HTML:
I want to add a dice roll to my story.

I have the code example but do not know where it goes.

Does it go in the body of the story or is it added into the page link?

Posts.EditableText:
Is this a Quest gamebook?

Where you put the dice roll depends what you want to do with it; but generally you'll want it to be on a "script" type page.
